CmdLine: apk update &&     apk add linux-headers make bash git g++ gcc libc-dev zlib-dev bzip2-dev snappy-dev lz4-dev perl coreutils
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /tmp && wget https://github.com/facebook/zstd/archive/v1.1.3.tar.gz &&     mv v1.1.3.tar.gz zstd-1.1.3.tar.gz &&     tar zxvf zstd-1.1.3.tar.gz &&     cd zstd-1.1.3 &&     make && make install &&     cd /tmp && rm -rf zstd-1.1.3
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /tmp && git clone https://github.com/gflags/gflags.git &&     cd gflags &&     git checkout v2.0 &&     ./configure && make && make install &&     cd /tmp && rm -rf gflags
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /tmp && git clone https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb.git &&     cd rocksdb &&     git checkout v6.4.6 &&     DEBUG_LEVEL=0 make shared_lib install-shared &&     cd /tmp && rm -rf rocksdb &&     export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/lib
Commands.Name: run
